hizbs.text: wa-ila thamuda akhahum salihan qala yaqawmi uʿ'budu l-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu huwa ansha-akum mina l-ardi wa-is'taʿmarakum fiha fa-is'taghfiruhu thumma tubu ilayhi inna rabbi qaribun mujibun
qalu yasalihu qad kunta fina marjuwwan qabla hadha atanhana an naʿbuda ma yaʿbudu abauna wa-innana lafi shakkin mimma tadʿuna ilayhi muribin
qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ʿala bayyinatin min rabbi waatani min'hu rahmatan faman yansuruni mina l-lahi in ʿasaytuhu fama tazidunani ghayra takhsirin
wayaqawmi hadhihi naqatu l-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi l-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum ʿadhabun qaribun
faʿaqaruha faqala tamattaʿu fi darikum thalathata ayyamin dhalika waʿdun ghayru makdhubin
falamma jaa amruna najjayna salihan wa-alladhina amanu maʿahu birahmatin minna wamin khiz'yi yawmi-idhin inna rabbaka huwa l-qawiyu l-ʿazizu
wa-akhadha alladhina zalamu l-sayhatu fa-asbahu fi diyarihim jathimina
ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha ala inna thamuda kafaru rabbahum ala buʿ'dan lithamuda
walaqad jaat rusuluna ib'rahima bil-bush'ra qalu salaman qala salamun fama labitha an jaa biʿij'lin hanidhin
falamma raa aydiyahum la tasilu ilayhi nakirahum wa-awjasa min'hum khifatan qalu la takhaf inna ur'sil'na ila qawmi lutin
wa-im'ra-atuhu qaimatun fadahikat fabasharnaha bi-is'haqa wamin warai is'haqa yaʿquba
qalat yawaylata a-alidu wa-ana ʿajuzun wahadha baʿli shaykhan inna hadha lashayon ʿajibun
qalu ataʿjabina min amri l-lahi rahmatu l-lahi wabarakatuhu ʿalaykum ahla l-bayti innahu hamidun majidun
falamma dhahaba ʿan ib'rahima l-rawʿu wajaathu l-bush'ra yujadiluna fi qawmi lutin
inna ib'rahima lahalimun awwahun munibun
yaib'rahimu aʿrid ʿan hadha innahu qad jaa amru rabbika wa-innahum atihim ʿadhabun ghayru mardudin
walamma jaat rusuluna lutan sia bihim wadaqa bihim dharʿan waqala hadha yawmun ʿasibun
wajaahu qawmuhu yuh'raʿuna ilayhi wamin qablu kanu yaʿmaluna l-sayiati qala yaqawmi haulai banati hunna atharu lakum fa-ittaqu l-laha wala tukh'zuni fi dayfi alaysa minkum rajulun rashidun
qalu laqad ʿalim'ta ma lana fi banatika min haqqin wa-innaka lataʿlamu ma nuridu
qala law anna li bikum quwwatan aw awi ila ruk'nin shadidin

qalu yalutu inna rusulu rabbika lan yasilu ilayka fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'ʿin mina al-layli wala yaltafit minkum ahadun illa im'ra-ataka innahu musibuha ma asabahum inna mawʿidahumu l-sub'hu alaysa l-sub'hu biqaribin
falamma jaa amruna jaʿalna ʿaliyaha safilaha wa-amtarna ʿalayha hijaratan min sijjilin mandudin
musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wama hiya mina l-zalimina bibaʿidin
